text:
Miss, Sir,
Today, I’m in third year of information and communication and I really want to become journalism. My study is for me the way to do the job I really want. Last years,  I learn a lot about the notion of communication. For me, have a traineeship is very important, it permit to work and learn more about this topic.
I do lot of reacherch to find the the good traineeship who could help my in my futur and who match with my actual study. I find a traineeship in Paris, this traineeship is perfect for me because he match exactly with my knowledge and could bring me new one. In fact, this job is in a company who wrote very famous newspaper in Paris. Work here can help me to find a futur job and have a experience in foreign country. I think this project is a good idea to learn more and practice what I already learn. Also, work in a foreign country is the opportunity to discover a all new word, with a new culture.
This project will be for the next year, and I want to go 6 months. This travel is very expensive without help, this is the reason why I transmit you this letter. A grant for my project is for me the only solution. With a grant, I could see my travel more simply, with less money issues and I can really imagine to improve my English and my knowledge in communication.
Thank you for your time and comprehension.
